name: Rice
introduction: Rice is the staple food crop of Sri Lanka, cultivated extensively throughout the country.

cultivation_practices.irrigation: Flood irrigation or alternate wetting and drying
cultivation_practices.fertilization: NPK application based on soil testing

harvesting.time: 90-120 days after planting, depending on variety

yield_economics.market_price: Varies based on variety and quality

case_studies.title: Success of System of Rice Intensification in Ampara District
case_studies.summary: Farmers achieved 30% higher yields with reduced water usage.

faqs.question: What are the best rice varieties for drought-prone areas?
faqs.answer: Drought-tolerant varieties like BG 300 and BG 350 are recommended.
